title: The Documentary Big Tech Doesn’t Want You To See
description:
Created Equal: Clarence Thomas In His Own Words has a 99% audience score on Rotten Tomatoes and was one of the most popular documentaries on Amazon. So why did the tech giant abruptly pull it from their streaming service, without offering any explanation? If Amazon won’t let you watch Created Equal, the Daily Wire will. Join us tonight for a special live streaming event and watch this riveting documentary that was deplatformed by Big Tech. If you're not a Daily Wire member, join now for 20% off with code JUSTICE. You can watch Created Equal on demand, along with our other great members-only content! Join here: https://utm.io/uds0A
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
